mcq.statement: Who were the main opponents of the East India Company in the Battle of Buxar?

options.b: Mir Qasim and Shah Alam II
options.c: Siraj ud-Daulah and Bahadur Shah Zafar

mcq.one_liner: The main opponents of the East India Company at the Battle of Buxar were **the combined armies of Mir Qasim and Mughal Emperor Shah Alam II**.

suggestions.topic: Sikh Dynasty, First/Second Anglo-Sikh War & Rulers
